info.title: Contact Sensor

sensor.contact.name: sensor.contact
sensor.contact.description: This Resource describes whether a contact sensor has been tripped or not. Typical use case is in Security Systems detecting window or door open. The Property "value" is a boolean. A value of 'true' means that contact has been broken (open). A value of 'false' means that contact is in place (closed).

value.name: value
value.description: The contact indication, true = broken (open), false = in place (closed).
